settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your preferences and data.
settings.currencyDesc: Select your primary currency for display.
settings.enforceUniqueDesc: Prevent creating multiple budgets for the same category within a profile.
settings.demoModeDesc: Populate the application with sample data (Transactions, Assets, Budgets) to explore the features.
settings.demoModeWarning: Warning: This will overwrite your current data!
settings.exportJSONDesc: Download a backup of all your transactions, assets, and settings.
settings.exportExcelDesc: Export data to Excel for external analysis (Personal & Family).
settings.importExcelDesc: Import transactions and assets from your Excel file (Income, Expense, Asset sheets).
settings.resetWarning: Caution: This action cannot be undone.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Strategic overview of your financial health.
